manor-of-whispers.title: Manor of Whispers
manor-of-whispers.content: A decaying Victorian estate on the edge of the Blackwood Forest. Locals claim to hear voices coming from the walls at night.
manor-of-whispers.lore: A decaying Victorian estate on the edge of the Blackwood Forest. Locals claim to hear voices coming from the walls at night.

lord-julian-thorne.title: Lord Julian Thorne
lord-julian-thorne.content:
A high-born vampire who has resided in the Manor for centuries. He is elegant, charming, and utterly ruthless.

He is obsessed with completing [[The Sanguine Ritual]].
lord-julian-thorne.lore:
A high-born vampire who has resided in the Manor for centuries. He is elegant, charming, and utterly ruthless.

He is obsessed with completing [[The Sanguine Ritual]].

seraphina-vane.title: Seraphina Vane
seraphina-vane.content: A half-vampire hunter who tracks Julian's lineage. She uses a silver-tipped crossbow and ancient alchemy.
seraphina-vane.lore: A half-vampire hunter who tracks Julian's lineage. She uses a silver-tipped crossbow and ancient alchemy.

crimson-court.title: The Crimson Court
crimson-court.content: A clandestine organization of vampire nobles who pull the strings of mortal society from the shadows.
crimson-court.lore: A clandestine organization of vampire nobles who pull the strings of mortal society from the shadows.

dire-bat.title: Cave Dire Bat
dire-bat.content: A monstrous bat with a six-foot wingspan and a taste for human blood. They serve as Julian's eyes in the sky.
dire-bat.lore: A monstrous bat with a six-foot wingspan and a taste for human blood. They serve as Julian's eyes in the sky.

eclipse-ritual-note.title: Notes on the Eternal Eclipse
eclipse-ritual-note.content: A series of blood-stained sketches and incantations detailing the astronomical alignment required for Julian's ritual.
eclipse-ritual-note.lore: A series of blood-stained sketches and incantations detailing the astronomical alignment required for Julian's ritual.

the-sanguine-ritual.title: The Sanguine Ritual
the-sanguine-ritual.content: An ancient ceremony designed to grant its caster total immunity to sunlight. It requires the essence of three pure souls.
the-sanguine-ritual.lore: An ancient ceremony designed to grant its caster total immunity to sunlight. It requires the essence of three pure souls.
